context_of_use: This use case allows customers to view the status and progress of their existing orders within the online shopping system.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: to know the delivery status of their orders
description: This use case enables customers to track their orders and view the delivery status.
triggering_event: Customer requests to track their orders.
preconditions: The customer must have an existing order.
The customer must be logged into their account.
postconditions: The customer successfully views the status of their order.
assumptions: The customer has internet access to use the system.
The order tracking information is available in the system.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to track their orders.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of order statuses displayed to the customer.
main_flow: 1. Customer requests to track their orders → System displays the order tracking interface.
2. Customer selects an order to track → System retrieves and displays the current status of the selected order.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the customer is not logged in, then the system prompts the customer to log in.
